verbose_text: As a result, 11 genes, including ADP ribosylation factor like GTPase 6 interacting protein 5 (P = 0.017), connective tissue growth factor (CTGF; P = 0.047), matrix metallopeptidase 12 (P = 0.0068), myotubularin related protein 14 (MTMR14; P = 0.03), p21 (RAC1)-activated kinase 4 (P = 0.026), protein phosphatase 3 catalytic subunit alpha (PPP3CA; P = 0.018), suppressor of cytokine signaling 7 (SOCS7; P = 0.0084), STAT1 (P = 0.015), tropomyosin 3 (P = 0.0015), tetraspanin 6 (P = 0.036), vascular endothelial growth factor A (P = 0.0049) and AT rich interaction domain 4B (P = 0.015), were obtained, among which 4 genes (CTGF, exp (coef) = 1.1; MTMR14, exp (coef) = 1.42; PPP3CA, exp (coef) = 1.31; SOCS7, exp (coef) = 1.43) were suggested to be risk factors for prognosis.
